statement.name: INSERT_SMARCP
statement.desc: Inserci√≥n tabla de Requerimiento por Programa
statement.sql: INSERT INTO smarcp( codcia, nrorcp, nropgm, tporcp, codrcp, stdrcp, sqlbkr) VALUES (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

statement.name: DELETE_SMARCP
statement.sql: DELETE FROM smarcp WHERE codcia=? and nropgm=? and tporcp=?
